summary: Follow the rise and fall of the King of Arcades as one man pursues his dream against all odds.
cast: Ralph H. Baer|Tim Balderamos|Greg Bond|Jerry Buckner|Hank Chien|Walter Day|Brett Frana|Ben Gold|Donald Hayes|Leonard Herman|Jon Jamshid|Eugene Jarvis|Isaiah TriForce Johnson|Richie Knucklez|George Leutz|Dale Levin|Ryan McLelland|Tim McVey|Billy Mitchell|Dan Orrico|Mark Robichek|Todd Rogers|Steve Sanders|Robert Thomas Suto|Todd Tuckey|Stephen Wagner|Joel West|Steve Wiebe
director: Director: Sean Tiedeman (as F. Sean Tiedeman)
title: The King of Arcades
